revision.text: '''Charti''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by planting [[Cornn]] and equipping the [[Cell Battery]]. The Cornn will then have a chance to mutate into this berry. This berry can be bought from the Johto [[Berry Master]] for 10,000 {{farmpoints}} if the player is running the "No Oak Item" [[Challenge Mode|challenge]], and has already unlocked the Cornn berry.
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
